perturbation.original_text: This Sponsorship Agreement ("Agreement") is made an entered into on February 17, 1999 ("Effective Date"), by and between Tickets.com, Inc., a Delaware corporation, located at 4061 Glencoe Ave., Marina del Rey, CA 90292 ("Tickets") and MP3.com, Inc., having an address at P.O. Box 910091, San Diego, CA 92191-0091 ("MP3.com"). MP3.com owns and operates the website located at www.mp3.com (the "Website").
perturbation.changed_text: This Sponsorship Agreement ("Arrangement") is made and entered into on February 17, 1999 ("Commencement Date"), by and between Tickets.com, Inc., a Delaware corporation, located at 4061 Glencoe Ave., Marina del Rey, CA 90292 ("Tickets") and MP3.com, Inc., having an address at P.O. Box 910091, San Diego, CA 92191-0091 ("MP3"). MP3.com owns and operates the website located at www.mp3.com (the "Site").
perturbation.explanation: Changing "Agreement" to "Arrangement", "Effective Date" to "Commencement Date" and "MP3.com" to "MP3" and "Website" to "Site" introduces inconsistency and potential ambiguity, especially if other sections still refer to the original terms. This makes it unclear which terms are legally binding or how they should be interpreted, creating a contradiction and uncertainty.

perturbation.original_text: MP3.com agrees to deliver a guaranteed minimum of 3,000,000 Impressions per month for the term of this Agreement. An "Impression" is defined as the display of the Tickets Portal to a user on one of the above referenced pages.
perturbation.changed_text: MP3 agrees to provide approximately 3,000,000 Views monthly during the contract. A "View" means showing the Tickets space to a visitor on the stated pages.
perturbation.explanation: Changing "MP3.com" to "MP3", "Impressions" to "Views", "Tickets Portal" to "Tickets Space", "term of this Agreement" to "contract" makes it ambiguous whether the new terms carry the same obligations as the original ones. The change from "guaranteed minimum" to "approximately" creates a quantifiable contradiction, making it difficult to enforce the original guaranteed amount. It is uncertain whether 'visitor' is the same as 'user'.

perturbation.original_text: This Agreement shall commence on the Effective Date and shall remain in full force and effect until one (1) year subsequent to the Effective Date, provided however, that Tickets may terminate this Agreement for any reason upon thirty (30) days' notice to MP3. com at any time prior to the expiration of sixty (60) days subsequent to the Effective Date.
perturbation.changed_text: This Arrangement starts on the Commencement Date and lasts for a year after the Commencement Date, but Tickets can cancel this Arrangement with thirty (30) days' notice to MP3 before sixty (60) days past the Commencement Date.
perturbation.explanation: Changing "Agreement" to "Arrangement", "Effective Date" to "Commencement Date" and "MP3.com" to "MP3" and rephrasing of the sentence leads to inconsistency with the first changed term in the 'Preamble' section and ambiguity. If the earlier sections are not modified to reflect these changes, then there exists an in-text contradiction.
